selectedVerses.text: Thus says the LORD: If I have not established my covenant with day and night and the fixed order of heaven and earth,
and as the fixed portion of oil, measured in baths, one tenth of a bath from each cor (the cor, like the homer, contains ten baths).
Then I shall not be put to shame, having my eyes fixed on all your commandments.
He said to them, "It is not for you to know times or seasons that the Father has fixed by his own authority.
Thus says the LORD, who gives the sun for light by day and the fixed order of the moon and the stars for light by night, who stirs up the sea so that its waves roar--the LORD of hosts is his name:
